options.text: What happened to that house over there?

dialogues.text: The Warden of Celenor Forest used to live there. Ever since that fog appeared around Celenor Forest, he has been missing.

options.text: Where did the fog come from?
I will look for the Warden.

dialogues.text: I don't know. The fog just appeared out of nowhere. It's impossible to see anything and it has blocked entrance to the forest completely.
The world needs more heroes like you, traveler! I suggest you talk to Elenthir in Celewynn. He is the leader of the elven establishment west of here.
The elves in Celewynn are closely connected to the forest. They might be able to tell you more about the origin of the fog.
